details.description: Register a brand as a trademark to protect your intellectual property
details.more_information:
The application fee is £170. This is non-refundable and doesn’t guarantee registration of your trademark. You also need:

  • details for your trademark, eg an illustration or slogan
  • the trademark classes you want to register for, eg medical, vehicles

The fee for the first trademark class is included in the application fee. Each additional class costs £50.
details.introduction: Register a brand as a trademark online. You can’t make changes to your trademark after it’s been registered.

details.description: Includes registering, protecting and applying for designs and patents
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.

related.title: How to protect your intellectual property

details.description: What intellectual property is, how your business can protect it, and what to do if someone infringes it - includes copyright, patents and trademarks
